entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: The main character of the story, mentioned as a student who is being addressed by Dumbledore.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: A wise and powerful wizard who is questioning Voldemort about his followers.

entities.name: voldemort
entities.description: The main antagonist of the story, a dark wizard who is being questioned by Dumbledore.

entities.name: hog's head
entities.description: A pub where Voldemort's followers might be waiting for his return.

relationships.description: Dumbledore is questioning Voldemort about his followers and their intentions.
Voldemort considers Harry Potter as one of those who will carry on without him, implying that he has some sort of command over Harry.
Nott is mentioned as being one of Voldemort's followers, awaiting his return at the Hog's Head.
Rosier is mentioned as being one of Voldemort's followers, awaiting his return at the Hog's Head.
Mulciber is mentioned as being one of Voldemort's followers, awaiting his return at the Hog's Head.
Dolohov is mentioned as being one of Voldemort's followers, awaiting his return at the Hog's Head.
